Central University of Andhra Pradesh Highlights
Central University of Andhra Pradesh Courses and Fees
description: The university offers UG, PG as well as PhD courses under 12 dedicated departments. The university offers a total of 8 UG, 17 PG, 1 Diploma, and 6 PhD courses in different specializations. The duration of the UG courses ranges between 3-4 years and duration of PG courses is 2 years. Some of the popular courses that are offered by the university are B.Sc (Hons) Economics, BA (Hons) Political Science, B.Sc (Hons) CS & AI, MA Telugu, MBA, MSc in Space Science and Technology and more. To become eligible for UG courses, candidates must have qualified in CUET UG, and for admission to PG courses, candidates must have qualified in CUET PG. The Central University of Andhra Pradesh eligibility criteria, annual fees, and selection process for all programs are given in the table below:

basic_info.name: Central University of Andhra Pradesh Admissions 2024
description: The Central University of Andhra Pradesh offers admission to the UG & PG courses on the basis of performance in CUET (Common University Entrance Test). The admission process for the university started immediately after the release of CUET results by NTA. The qualified candidates have to apply for their chosen course at the university. The university shortlists the candidates on the basis of their CUET scores.

The university prepares a merit list of the registered candidates for the available courses and conducts admission counselling. The candidates have to participate in the counselling process (online) and, if eligible, complete the admission formalities as well.

basic_info.name: Central University of Andhra Pradesh Placements 2024
description: There is a dedicated placement cell at CUAP that has recently organized a workshop on the topic of “Campus to Corporate: Life Skills Colloquium.” The cell works throughout the year to prepare the students to get attractive placement opportunities after the completion of their education. It trains the students on various parameters such as preparing striking resume, soft skills, ethics, professionalism, personality and self-confidence, self-motivation, problem-solving techniques, and more. In the recent placement drive, 126 students were placed with attractive packages. Given below are the Central University of Andhra Pradesh Placement 2024 Highlights:

Central University of Andhra Pradesh offers various centrally-funded scholarships to the students of the university. Scholarships are offered generally to meritorious students or students with economically backward classes such as SC/ ST/ OBC and EWS categories. To avail the scholarships, interested candidates have to register on the National Scholarship Portal (NSP). The NSP is a one-stop solution for all the students who want to avail the state as well as centrally-funded scholarships. Some of the top scholarships available at the Central University of Andhra Pradesh are listed below with eligibility and scholarship rewards

description: The Central University of Andhra Pradesh provides various top notch facilities to the students. The campus is spread over a 491 acres with all the facilities readily accessible to the students. CUAP has a massive campus with great amenities for enrolled students. The facilities include, hostels, Reading hall, a massive ground, WiFi, Transportation, Canteen, and more. Listed below are some of the facilities that students can benefit from while studying at the Central University of Andhra Pradesh.

basic_info.name: Central University of Andhra Pradesh FAQs

faqs.question: Is there reservation for SC/ST students inCentral University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.Central University of Andhra Pradesh has reservation of seats for the reserved classes. It offers 15% of the seats in each course for Scheduled Castes students. Moreover, it has allocated 7.5% of seats for Scheduled Tribe. These seats are interchangeable upon the need. Moreover, the Central University of Andhra Pradesh has 27% seats reserved for OBC (Non-Creamy Layer), and 10% for the EWS candidates.

faqs.question: What is the mode of the application form at Central University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.The application mode at Central University of Andhra Pradesh is online. Students have to first register through the SAMARTH portal online. Then the central university will release the provisional merit list. The shortlisted candidates will be called for an off-line counselling session.

faqs.question: Which facilities are offered by Central University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: The Central University of Andhra Pradesh offers great facilities for students. It offers facilities such as a reading hall, playground with a gym, IT Labs, boys and girls canteen, separate hostels, medical facilities, and more.

faqs.question: Who are the top recruiters at the Central University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.Some of the top recruiters who participate in the placement drive of the university are PWC, Asian Paints, Data Marshall, Noble Institute of Communicative English, Ramoji Film City, ETV, ViRaj Tech, English Edge, and more.

faqs.question: Does CUAP accepts any entrance exam to provide admission?
faqs.answer: Yes. For admission to UG courses, the Central University of Andhra Pradesh accepts CUET UG scores. CUET PG scores are accepted by the university for admission to the PG courses. CUET is a national-level entrance exam administered every year by National Testing Agency (NTA).

faqs.question: How many PG courses are offered by CUAP?
faqs.answer: The Central University of Andhra Pradesh is offering a total of 17 PG courses in different specializations to interested candidates in 2024-25 academic year. The courses are mentioned below -MA EnglishMA TeluguMA Political ScienceMSc Applied PsychologyMSc EconomicsMSc Mathematics and ComputingMSc Artificial Intelligence & Data ScienceMSc Molecular BiologyMBA (Master of Business Administration)MComMA Governance and Public PolicyMA Hindi (Professional and Literature)MSc Clinical PsychologyMSc Computational Social ScienceMSc Economics and Data AnalyticsMSc Geography and GeoinformaticsMSc Space Science and Technology

faqs.question: Can I get admission to Central University of Andhra Pradesh without CUET?
faqs.answer: Ans.No. Students cannot get admission to CUAP without CUET scores. The entrance exam provides fair and equal opportunities to the Indian students to get into any university of their choice using the exam scores. The selection criteria remains the same for everyone.

faqs.question: Ques.Is Central University of Andhra Pradesh private or government?
faqs.answer: The Central University of Andhra Pradesh is a government-owned central university. It was established by an act of Parliament in 2019. The university is recognized by UGC.

faqs.question: Is there a personal interview in Central University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: To get admission into the central University of Andhra Pradesh, applicants do not have to appear for any personal interview. The admissions to the simple University are based on the CUET scores only. Once the merit lists are announced on the official website, students must appear for the off-line counselling.

faqs.question: Is there a hostel facility at Central University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: The Central University of Andhra Pradesh offers hostel facilities for students. The boy’s and girl’s hostels are separate with 24/7 security features. The hostel fee is INR 14,500 per semester and the mess fee is INR 15,000 per semester for the academic year 2024-25.

faqs.question: What are the required documents for admission at Central University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.The Central University of Andhra Pradesh document verification will be done once the counselling session is scheduled. The documents required at the time of counseling are as follows:Passport size Digital PhotographScanned SignatureSecondary School (Class 10th) Mark SheetPass Certificate of Class 10thSenior Secondary School (Class 12th) Mark Sheet or equivalentValid Certificate for Date of BirthCUET- UG/PG application formCUET- UG/PG admit cardValid CUET score cardConduct Certificate from Head of Institution last attended (Original+2 photocopy)Migration Certificate (Original+2 Xerox)Transfer CertificateCaste/ PWD/PH Certificates

faqs.question: Is there a medical facility for students at Central University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.Along with numerous facilities like hostels, massive playground, Central University of Andhra Pradesh provides hostel facilities. An MBBS, MD doctor is available on campus for employees, students, and non-teaching staff.

Section.name: About Central University of Andhra Pradesh
Section.description:
Central University of Andhra Pradesh (CUAP) is a central university and was established in the year 2018. It is situated in the district headquarters town of Ananthapuramu in the Rayalaseema region of Andhra Pradesh. CUAP is UGC-recognized and is ranked at the 32nd position among Central Universities by IIRF 2024. The university is currently operating from its transit campus is JNTU and the permanent campus is being constructed of over 491.30 acres of land in Janthaluru village, Anantapur district. The academic session 2024-25 will start at the new university campus only.
The university offers a total of 32 UG, PG, Diploma as well as PhD courses to the interested candidates. For admission to UG and PG courses, the university accepts CUET scores. After qualifying in the entrance exam, candidates have to appear in the university-led counselling process to get admission to their chosen courses.
The on-campus placement opportunities are also offered to the candidates in the final year of their degree. Some major recruiters like ETV, Ramoji Fil City, TCS, Asian Paints and more participate in the CUAP placement drives. The campus comprises of all the major facilities such as library, laboratories, IT labioratoies, spacious classrooms, experienced faculty members and more.
Central University of Andhra Pradesh has also signed MoUs with organizations like Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi; Central University of Punjab, Bathinda; Airports Authority of India; Indian Institute of Space Science and Technology, Trivandrum; and IIT Jodhpur.

The duration of the UG courses ranges between 3-4 years and duration of PG courses is 2 years. Some of the popular courses that are offered by the university are B.Sc (Hons) Economics, BA (Hons) Political Science, B.Sc (Hons) CS & AI, MA Telugu, MBA, MSc in Space Science and Technology and more. To become eligible for UG courses, candidates must have qualified in CUET UG, and for admission to PG courses, candidates must have qualified in CUET PG. Ans. Central University of Andhra Pradesh has reservation of seats for the reserved classes. It offers 15% of the seats in each course for Scheduled Castes students. Moreover, it has allocated 7.5% of seats for Scheduled Tribe. These seats are interchangeable upon the need. Moreover, the Central University of Andhra Pradesh has 27% seats reserved for OBC (Non-Creamy Layer), and 10% for the EWS candidates.
Ques. What is the mode of the application form at Central University of Andhra Pradesh?
Ans. The application mode at Central University of Andhra Pradesh is online. Students have to first register through the SAMARTH portal online. Then the central university will release the provisional merit list. The shortlisted candidates will be called for an off-line counselling session.
